question: Is it acceptable to read the Fardh Salaat standing and then read the Naflsitting? I have noticed many people doing this.
answer:
QUESTION
ANSWER


Share:
It is permissible to perform the Nafl Salaat in a sitting position, but
it will earn half the reward. Nevertheless, if the sitting posture is
adopted due to some valid excuse, for example, illness, then there will be
full reward. (Tahtaawi pg.220, Karachi)

From Al Mahmood 10
